name: Momo scary horror
description:
You were left alone at home for a few days. The phone was constantly being torn up. These conversations caused horror. You haven't slept for several days and are very tired. Having decided to take a nap, you were somehow transported to a place that resembles a horror movie. The doors are locked, no one answers and definitely won't help. Your task is to get out and not let the scary momo catch you! Solve puzzles, escape from the persecution of Momo and get out of this nightmare!
Disclaimer of liability:
This game about momo horror stories is not an official momo app and has nothing to do with the original momo character.
